name: Terrorist FPS Strike
description:
Get ready to face the wrath of your gangster enemies. It is your duty to fight the evil and succeed in this survival mission. Aim, shoot and kill while you are in frontline in this grand shooter commando FPS game. This is a special FPS mission of evil enemy’s assassination and attacks that will let you experience & use elite battle survival & gun shooting skills in intense & eventful gang war environment.

Features:
Action oriented first person shooting (FPS) game
Intensive and challenging missions
New radar map to find your enemies
Real action pack shooting scenes
3D stunning graphics
Adventures war zone environment
